Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pizza

  • public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the pizza availability of a particular flavor
    Author:
    Paul Armstrong

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double costPerSlice
      The cost in CAD for a single slice of pizza.
      private java.lang.String flavor
      The flavor of pizza this object represents.
      private int slicesAvailable
      The number of pizza slices available for sale.
      private int slicesSold
      The number of pizza slices already sold.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pizza(java.lang.String flavorIn, double costPerSliceIn)
      Constructs a new instance by using the parameters for the flavor and cost per size and by setting the slices available and slices sold to 0

      • bake

        public void bake(int numberOfNewPizzaSlices)
        Method to reflect the availability of more pizza Increases the available number of slices by the number of new pizza slices
        Parameters:
        numberOfNewPizzaSlices - ­ The number of new pizzas just baked

      • calculateIncome

        public double calculateIncome()
        Method to calculate the total income of this flavor by multiplying the number of its sold slices by the cost per slice
        Returns:
        the total income this pizza flavor has produced so far
